encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - TEXT: remove 1. in header line; add comma after Socrates and add space between words in line 1; add question mark in l.2 after λόγον and comma after ἐρεῖν; add question mark after ἀπαλλατῇ and comma after ἐρῶ in l.4; add period after name ending at start of l.6; add raised dot after ἀδύνατον in l.9; delete |ed| code in l.10; remove dot on alpha of σα in l.11; insert comma after σε in l.12; insert a comma after σοι in l.14; insert a period after ἐάσει in l.15. META: remove volume number from biblio 79329 and update field name for #5078. Add passage details. Add CWKB numbers for Plato (1050) and Alcibiades 1 (3580); TM number for Plato is 694. MP3 is 1407.01; correct the spelling of Oxyrhynchus and add Pleiades georef (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736983).

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - TEXT: remove 1. in header line; add comma after Socrates and add space between words in line 1; add question mark in l.2 after λόγον and comma after ἐρεῖν; add question mark after ἀπαλλατῇ and comma after ἐρῶ in l.4; add period after name ending at start of l.6; add raised dot after ἀδύνατον in l.9; delete |ed| code in l.10; remove dot on alpha of σα in l.11; insert comma after σε in l.12; insert a comma after σοι in l.14; insert a period after ἐάσει in l.15. META: remove volume number from biblio 79329 and update field name for #5078. Add passage details. Add CWKB numbers for Plato (1050) and Alcibiades 1 (3580); TM number for Plato is 694. MP3 is 1407.01; correct the spelling of Oxyrhynchus and add Pleiades georef (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736983).
